title: Get historical token prices
description: Given `:chain_id` and `:contract_addresses`, return their historical prices. Can filter by date ranges and convert to `:quote_currency`. Only daily granularity is supported.

params.name: chain_id
params.description: Chain ID of the Blockchain being queried. Currently supports `1` for Ethereum Mainnet, `137` for Polygon/Matic Mainnet, `80001` for Polygon/Matic Mumbai Testnet, `56` for Binance Smart Chain, `43114` for Avalanche C-Chain Mainnet, `43113` for Fuji C-Chain Testnet, and `250` for Fantom Opera Mainnet.

params.name: contract_addresses
params.description: Passing in an `ENS` resolves automatically.

params.name: quote_currency
params.description: The requested fiat currency.

params.name: from
params.description: The start day of the historical price range. (YYYY-MM-DD)

params.name: to
params.description: The end day of the historical price range. (YYYY-MM-DD)

params.name: prices-at-asc
params.description: Sort the prices in chronological ascending order. By default, it's set to `false` and returns prices in chronological descending order.

params.name: format
params.description: If `format=csv`, return a flat CSV instead of JSON responses.

params.name: page-number
params.description: The specific page to be returned.

params.name: page-size
params.description: The number of results per page.

notes.title: Source for price feeds
notes.description: We rely on Coingecko for our source of token prices. Spot prices are updated every 10s and historical prices (daily granularity) are updated every day.

supports_erc.description: The standard interface(s) supported for this token, eg: `ERC-20`.

items.description: The standard interface(s) supported for this token, eg: `ERC-20`.

supports_erc.description: The standard interface(s) supported for this token, eg: `ERC-20`.

items.description: The standard interface(s) supported for this token, eg: `ERC-20`.

supports_erc.description: The standard interface(s) supported for this token, eg: `ERC-20`.

items.description: The standard interface(s) supported for this token, eg: `ERC-20`.

title: Get token balances for address
description: Given `:chain_id` and wallet `:address`, return current token balances along with their spot prices. This endpoint supports a variety of token standards like ERC20, ERC721 and ERC1155. As a special case, network native tokens like ETH on Ethereum are also returned even though it's not a token contract.

params.name: chain_id
params.description: Chain ID of the Blockchain being queried. Currently supports `1` for Ethereum Mainnet, `137` for Polygon/Matic Mainnet, `80001` for Polygon/Matic Mumbai Testnet, `56` for Binance Smart Chain, `43114` for Avalanche C-Chain Mainnet, `43113` for Fuji C-Chain Testnet, and `250` for Fantom Opera Mainnet.

params.name: address
params.description: Passing in an `ENS` resolves automatically.

params.name: nft
params.description: Set to `true` to return ERC721 and ERC1155 assets. Defaults to `false`.

params.name: no-nft-fetch
params.description: Set to `true` to skip fetching NFT metadata, which can result in faster responses. Defaults to `false` and only applies when `nft=true`.

params.name: quote-currency
params.description: The requested fiat currency.

params.name: format
params.description: If `format=csv`, return a flat CSV instead of JSON responses.

templates.description: Basic example of fetching token balances on Ethereum (with ENS resolution)
Basic example of fetching NFTs (ERC721 and ERC1155) on Ethereum

notes.title: ðŸ”¥ Now supporting Solana
notes.description: Get token balances for any address on Solana using chain_id 1399811149.

notes.title: No support for re-balancing tokens
notes.description: Tokens like Ampleforth (AMPL) that auto re-balance with custom scaling factors are not supported.

notes.title: Tokens classified as dust
notes.description: Tokens with less than $0.1 in spot fiat value get classified as dust. The developer is free to ignore/hide these tokens as they wish.

INFTMetadata.description: Array of NFTs that are held under this contract.

supports_erc.description: The standard interface(s) supported for this token, eg: `ERC-20`.

items.description: The standard interface(s) supported for this token, eg: `ERC-20`.

last_transferred_at.description: Last transferred date for a wallet

native_token.description: Indicates if a token is the chain's native gas token, eg: ETH on Ethereum.

balance.description: The asset balance. Use `contract_decimals` to scale this balance for display purposes.

quote_rate.description: The current spot exchange rate in `quote-currency`.

quote_rate_24h.description: The spot exchange rate in `quote-currency` as of 24 hours ago.

quote.description: The current balance converted to fiat in `quote-currency`.

quote_24h.description: The current balance converted to fiat in `quote-currency` as of 24 hours ago.

nft_data.description: Array of NFTs that are held under this contract.

title: Get historical portfolio value over time
description: Given `:chain_id` and wallet `:address`, return wallet value for the last 30 days at 24 hour interval timestamps.

params.name: chain_id
params.description: Chain ID of the Blockchain being queried. Currently supports `1` for Ethereum Mainnet, `137` for Polygon/Matic Mainnet, `80001` for Polygon/Matic Mumbai Testnet, `56` for Binance Smart Chain, `43114` for Avalanche C-Chain Mainnet, `43113` for Fuji C-Chain Testnet, and `250` for Fantom Opera Mainnet.

params.name: address
params.description: Passing in an `ENS` resolves automatically.

params.name: quote-currency
params.description: The requested fiat currency.

params.name: format
params.description: If `format=csv`, return a flat CSV instead of JSON responses.

params.name: days
params.description: The range of the historical portfolio in days, defaults to 30 days (max days = 2000).

templates.description: Basic example of fetching historical portfolio on Ethereum (with ENS resolution)

has_more.description: `true` if we can  paginate to get more data.

page_size.description: The number of results per page.

title: Get transactions for address
description: Given `:chain_id` and wallet `:address`, return all transactions along with their decoded log events. This endpoint does a deep-crawl of the blockchain to retrieve all kinds of transactions that references the `:address` including indexed topics within the event logs.

params.name: chain_id
params.description: Chain ID of the Blockchain being queried. Currently supports `1` for Ethereum Mainnet, `137` for Polygon/Matic Mainnet, `80001` for Polygon/Matic Mumbai Testnet, `56` for Binance Smart Chain, `43114` for Avalanche C-Chain Mainnet, `43113` for Fuji C-Chain Testnet, and `250` for Fantom Opera Mainnet.

params.name: address
params.description: Passing in an `ENS` resolves automatically.

params.name: block-signed-at-asc
params.description: Sort the transactions in chronological ascending order. By default, it's set to `false` and returns transactions in chronological descending order.

params.name: no-logs
params.description: Setting this to `true` will omit decoded event logs, resulting in lighter and faster responses. By default it's set to `false`.

params.name: page-number
params.description: The specific page to be returned.

params.name: page-size
params.description: The number of results per page.

params.name: quote-currency
params.description: The requested fiat currency.

params.name: format
params.description: If `format=csv`, return a flat CSV instead of JSON responses.

templates.description: Basic example of fetching transactions from an address on Ethereum with decoded log events

notes.title: sender_logo_url field
notes.description: sender_logo_url may reference to a not found resource (return status 404).

has_more.description: `true` if we can  paginate to get more data.

page_size.description: The number of results per page.

title: Get a block
description: Given `:chain_id` and `:block_height`, return a single block at `:block_height`. If `:block_height` is set to the value `latest`, return the latest block available.

params.name: chain_id
params.description: Chain ID of the Blockchain being queried. Currently supports `1` for Ethereum Mainnet, `137` for Polygon/Matic Mainnet, `80001` for Polygon/Matic Mumbai Testnet, `56` for Binance Smart Chain, `43114` for Avalanche C-Chain Mainnet, `43113` for Fuji C-Chain Testnet, and `250` for Fantom Opera Mainnet.

params.name: block_height
params.description: The height of the block.

params.name: quote-currency
params.description: The requested fiat currency.

params.name: format
params.description: If `format=csv`, return a flat CSV instead of JSON responses.

page_size.description: The number of results per page.

signed_at.description: The signed time of the block.

title: Get block heights
description: Given `:chain_id`, `:start_date` and `:end_date`, return all the block height(s) of a particular chain within a date range. If the `:end_date` is set to `latest`, return every block height from the `:start_date` to now.

params.name: chain_id
params.description: Chain ID of the Blockchain being queried. Currently supports `1` for Ethereum Mainnet, `137` for Polygon/Matic Mainnet, `80001` for Polygon/Matic Mumbai Testnet, `56` for Binance Smart Chain, `43114` for Avalanche C-Chain Mainnet, `43113` for Fuji C-Chain Testnet, and `250` for Fantom Opera Mainnet.

params.name: start_date
params.description: The start datetime of the block height(s). (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ), eg: 2020-01-01 or 2020-01-01T03:36:50z

params.name: end_date
params.description: The ending datetime of the block height(s). (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ), eg: 2020-01-02 or 2020-01-02T03:36:50z

params.name: page-number
params.description: The specific page to be returned.

params.name: page-size
params.description: The number of results per page.

params.name: format
params.description: If `format=csv`, return a flat CSV instead of JSON responses.

templates.description: Basic example of retrieving block heights given a certain date range

has_more.description: `true` if we can  paginate to get more data.

page_size.description: The number of results per page.

signed_at.description: The signed time of the block.

title: Get XY=K pools
description: Given `:chain_id` and `:dexname`, return pool information across all `XY=K` pools including LP token prices, reserves, exchange volumes and fees.
classSubTypeDescription: xy=k is a generalized Uniswap-like endpoints for exchanges on various chains.

params.name: chain_id
params.description: Chain ID of the Blockchain being queried. Currently supports `1` for Ethereum Mainnet, `137` for Polygon/Matic Mainnet, `80001` for Polygon/Matic Mumbai Testnet, `56` for Binance Smart Chain, `43114` for Avalanche C-Chain Mainnet, `43113` for Fuji C-Chain Testnet, and `250` for Fantom Opera Mainnet.

params.name: dexname
params.description: One of `sushiswap`, `pancakeswap`, `quickswap`, `pangolin`, `spiritswap`, `spookyswap`.

params.name: contract-addresses
params.description: If `contract-addresses` (a comma separated list) is present, only return the pools that contain these contracts.

params.name: tickers
params.description: If `tickers` (a comma separated list) is present, only return the pools that contain these tickers.

params.name: page-number
params.description: The specific page to be returned.

params.name: page-size
params.description: The number of results per page.

params.description: The requested fiat currency.

title: Get XY=K supported DEXes
description: Returns a list of DEXes currently supported by the XY=K endpoints.
classSubTypeDescription: xy=k is a generalized Uniswap-like endpoints for exchanges on various chains.

quote.description: The current balance converted to fiat in `quote-currency`.

quote_rate.description: The current spot exchange rate in `quote-currency`.

total_supply.description: Total supply of this pool token.

quote.description: The current balance converted to fiat in `quote-currency`.

quote_rate.description: The current spot exchange rate in `quote-currency`.

title: Get NFT token IDs for contract
description: Given `:chain_id` and `:contract_address`, return a list of all token IDs for the NFT contract on the blockchain.

params.name: chain_id
params.description: Chain ID of the Blockchain being queried. Currently supports `1` for Ethereum Mainnet, `137` for Polygon/Matic Mainnet, `80001` for Polygon/Matic Mumbai Testnet, `56` for Binance Smart Chain, `43114` for Avalanche C-Chain Mainnet, `43113` for Fuji C-Chain Testnet, and `250` for Fantom Opera Mainnet.

params.name: contract_address
params.description: Smart contract address.

params.name: page-number
params.description: The specific page to be returned.

params.name: page-size
params.description: The number of results per page.

params.name: format
params.description: If `format=csv`, return a flat CSV instead of JSON responses.

templates.description: Get token IDs for Meme Ltd

has_more.description: `true` if we can  paginate to get more data.

page_size.description: The number of results per page.

supports_erc.description: The standard interface(s) supported for this token, eg: `ERC-20`.

items.description: The standard interface(s) supported for this token, eg: `ERC-20`.

token_id.description: The list of token ids under the contract address.

title: Get XY=K single network exchange token
description: Given `:chain_id`, `:dexname` and `:token_address`, return single network exchange token for a specific DEX.
classSubTypeDescription: xy=k is a generalized Uniswap-like endpoints for exchanges on various chains.

params.name: chain_id
params.description: Chain ID of the Blockchain being queried. Currently supports `1` for Ethereum Mainnet, `137` for Polygon/Matic Mainnet, `80001` for Polygon/Matic Mumbai Testnet, `56` for Binance Smart Chain, `43114` for Avalanche C-Chain Mainnet, `43113` for Fuji C-Chain Testnet, and `250` for Fantom Opera Mainnet.

params.name: token_address
params.description: token address

params.name: dexname
params.description: One of `sushiswap`, `pancakeswap`, `quickswap`, `pangolin`, `spiritswap`, `spookyswap`.

params.name: quote-currency
params.description: The requested fiat currency.

params.name: tickers
params.description: If `tickers` (a comma separated list) is present, only return the pools that contain these tickers.

params.name: page-number
params.description: The specific page to be returned.

params.name: page-size
params.description: The number of results per page.

has_more.description: `true` if we can  paginate to get more data.

page_size.description: The number of results per page.

title: Get NFT transactions for contract

params.name: chain_id
params.description: Chain ID of the Blockchain being queried. Currently supports `1` for Ethereum Mainnet, `137` for Polygon/Matic Mainnet, `80001` for Polygon/Matic Mumbai Testnet, `56` for Binance Smart Chain, `43114` for Avalanche C-Chain Mainnet, `43113` for Fuji C-Chain Testnet, and `250` for Fantom Opera Mainnet.

params.name: contract_address
params.description: Smart contract address.

params.name: token_id
params.description: The token ID

params.name: page-number
params.description: The specific page to be returned.

params.name: page-size
params.description: The number of results per page.

params.name: quote-currency
params.description: The requested fiat currency.

params.name: format
params.description: If `format=csv`, return a flat CSV instead of JSON responses.

templates.description: Get list of NFT transactions given Meme Ltd token ID

notes.title: sender_logo_url field
notes.description: sender_logo_url may reference to a not found resource (return status 404).

has_more.description: `true` if we can  paginate to get more data.

page_size.description: The number of results per page.

DecodedParamItem.description: The parameters of the decoded item.

decoded.description: The decoded value of the parameter.

name.description: The name of the decoded item.

signature.description: The signature of the decoded item.

params.description: The parameters of the decoded item.

block_signed_at.description: The signed time of the block.

sender_address_label.description: The label of the sender address.

supports_erc.description: The standard interface(s) supported for this token, eg: `ERC-20`.

items.description: The standard interface(s) supported for this token, eg: `ERC-20`.

block_signed_at.description: The signed time of the block.

from_address.description: The address where the transaction is from.

to_address.description: The address where the transaction is to.

value.description: The value attached to this tx.

value_quote.description: The value attached in `quote-currency` to this tx.

gas_offered.description: The gas offered for this tx.

gas_spent.description: The gas spent for this tx.

gas_price.description: The gas price at the time of this tx.

fees_paid.description: The total transaction fees paid for this tx.

gas_quote_rate.description: The gas exchange rate at the time of Tx in `quote_currency`.

title: Get XY=K transactions for account address

params.description: Chain ID of the Blockchain being queried. Currently supports `1` for Ethereum Mainnet, `137` for Polygon/Matic Mainnet, `80001` for Polygon/Matic Mumbai Testnet, `56` for Binance Smart Chain, `43114` for Avalanche C-Chain Mainnet, `43113` for Fuji C-Chain Testnet, and `250` for Fantom Opera Mainnet.

params.description: Passing in an `ENS` resolves automatically.

params.description: One of `sushiswap`, `pancakeswap`, `quickswap`, `pangolin`, `spiritswap`, `spookyswap`.

params.name: quote-currency
params.description: The requested fiat currency.

has_more.description: `true` if we can  paginate to get more data.

page_size.description: The number of results per page.

title: Get NFT external metadata for contract
description: Given `:chain_id`, `:contract_address` and `:token_id`, fetch and return the external metadata. Both ERC721 as well as ERC1155 standards are supported.

params.name: chain_id
params.description: Chain ID of the Blockchain being queried. Currently supports `1` for Ethereum Mainnet, `137` for Polygon/Matic Mainnet, `80001` for Polygon/Matic Mumbai Testnet, `56` for Binance Smart Chain, `43114` for Avalanche C-Chain Mainnet, `43113` for Fuji C-Chain Testnet, and `250` for Fantom Opera Mainnet.

params.name: contract_address
params.description: Smart contract address.

params.name: token_id
params.description: The token ID

params.name: quote-currency
params.description: The requested fiat currency.

params.name: format
params.description: If `format=csv`, return a flat CSV instead of JSON responses.

templates.description: Get NFT external metadata given Meme Ltd token ID

has_more.description: `true` if we can  paginate to get more data.

page_size.description: The number of results per page.

INFTMetadata.description: Array of NFTs that are held under this contract.

supports_erc.description: The standard interface(s) supported for this token, eg: `ERC-20`.

items.description: The standard interface(s) supported for this token, eg: `ERC-20`.

last_transferred_at.description: Last transferred date for a wallet

native_token.description: Indicates if a token is the chain's native gas token, eg: ETH on Ethereum.

balance.description: The asset balance. Use `contract_decimals` to scale this balance for display purposes.

quote_rate.description: The current spot exchange rate in `quote-currency`.

quote_rate_24h.description: The spot exchange rate in `quote-currency` as of 24 hours ago.

quote.description: The current balance converted to fiat in `quote-currency`.

quote_24h.description: The current balance converted to fiat in `quote-currency` as of 24 hours ago.

nft_data.description: Array of NFTs that are held under this contract.
